title: Chami Match - Recognize the Color!
description: A simple and fun color recognition training game!

gameRecord.title: Game Record
gameRecord.emptyContent: Your game records will be displayed here, but it's currently empty.

settings.title: Settings
settings.notice: Applying game options will start a new round.
settings.confirmReset: Reset will remove all your game data and settings. You can't undo this action.

about.title: About
about.text1: This game is inspired by the original idea from {colorTest}. Special thanks to {fragment} for his amazing idea!
about.text2: For more information, contributions, or to report issues, please visit the {githubRepo}.
about.developerText: A big thanks to all the developers who contributed to this project. Your hard work and dedication make this game better for everyone.

reset.title: Reset Game Data
reset.message: Are you sure you want to reset the game data? All your current progress will be lost.
